birth_place.zh-cn: 法兰西王国科西嘉阿雅克肖

description.zh-cn: 法国军事家、政治家，法兰西第一共和国第一执政及法兰西第一帝国皇帝。
description.en: French military and political leader, First Consul of the French First Republic and Emperor of the First French Empire.

description.zh-cn: 拿破仑一世的第一任妻子，法兰西第一帝国皇后。
description.en: The first wife of Napoleon I and the first Empress of the French.

description.zh-cn: 奥地利女大公，拿破仑一世的第二任妻子，法兰西皇后。
description.en: An Austrian archduchess who reigned as Duchess of Parma and was the second wife of Napoleon I and Empress of the French.

zh-cn: 拿破仑·法兰索瓦·约瑟夫·夏尔·波拿巴

description.zh-cn: 拿破仑一世与玛丽·路易莎之子，罗马王，名义上的法兰西皇帝。
description.en: Son of Napoleon I and Marie Louise, titled King of Rome, and disputed Emperor of the French.

description.zh-cn: 科西嘉律师和政治家，拿破仑一世的父亲。
description.en: Corsican lawyer and politician, father of Napoleon I.

nodes.id: 玛丽亚·莱蒂西亚·拉莫利诺

zh-cn: 玛丽亚·莱蒂西亚·拉莫利诺

description.zh-cn: 科西嘉贵族女性，拿破仑一世的母亲。
description.en: Corsican noblewoman, mother of Napoleon I.

description.zh-cn: 法国的社会政治剧变时期，为拿破仑的崛起创造了条件。
description.en: A period of social and political upheaval in France that created the conditions for Napoleon's rise.

description.zh-cn: 法国大革命战争中的一场军事对抗，拿破仑在此战中首次崭露头角，并因此被晋升为准将。
description.en: A military engagement in the French Revolutionary Wars where Napoleon first distinguished himself, leading to his promotion to brigadier general.

description.zh-cn: 法国大革命后期的五人执政团，被拿破仑在雾月政变中推翻。
description.en: The five-member governing committee during the later stages of the French Revolution, overthrown by Napoleon in the Coup of 18 Brumaire.

description.zh-cn: 拿破仑·波拿巴发动的政变，推翻了督政府，建立了执政府，使他成为法兰西第一执政。
description.en: A coup d'état by Napoleon Bonaparte that overthrew the Directory and established the Consulate, making him First Consul of France.

description.zh-cn: 雾月政变后建立的法国政府，由拿破仑担任第一执政。
description.en: The government of France established after the Coup of 18 Brumaire, with Napoleon as First Consul.

description.zh-cn: 由拿破仑建立并统治的帝国，在19世纪初主宰了欧洲大陆。
description.en: The empire established and ruled by Napoleon, which dominated continental Europe in the early 19th century.

description.zh-cn: 拿破仑战争中最具决定性的战役之一，法军在此击败了俄奥联军，导致第三次反法同盟瓦解。
description.en: One of the most decisive engagements of the Napoleonic Wars, where the French army defeated the Russo-Austrian army, leading to the collapse of the Third Coalition.

description.zh-cn: 由英国、俄罗斯帝国、奥地利帝国等国组成的反对法兰西第一帝国的联盟。
description.en: A European conflict involving the United Kingdom, the Russian Empire, the Austrian Empire, and others against the First French Empire.

description.zh-cn: 拿破仑入侵俄罗斯的军事行动，最终因战略失败和严酷的冬季而惨败，成为其帝国覆灭的转折点。
description.en: Napoleon's invasion of Russia, which ended in a catastrophic failure due to strategic errors and the harsh winter, becoming the turning point for the downfall of his empire.

description.zh-cn: 第六次反法同盟战争中的决定性战役，拿破仑在此战中惨败，导致其丧失对德意志的控制。
description.en: The decisive battle of the War of the Sixth Coalition, where Napoleon suffered a major defeat, leading to the loss of his control over Germany.

description.zh-cn: 由奥地利、普鲁士、俄罗斯、英国、瑞典等国组成的联盟，最终击败拿破仑并迫使其首次退位。
description.en: A coalition of Austria, Prussia, Russia, the United Kingdom, Sweden, and other nations that ultimately defeated Napoleon and forced his first abdication.

description.zh-cn: 拿破仑第一次退位后被流放的地中海岛屿。
description.en: The Mediterranean island to which Napoleon was exiled after his first abdication.

description.zh-cn: 拿破仑从厄尔巴岛返回法国并重新掌权的时期，最终以滑铁卢之战的失败告终。
description.en: The period when Napoleon returned from exile on Elba to regain power in France, which ended with his defeat at the Battle of Waterloo.

description.zh-cn: 拿破仑的最后一战，他在此被威灵顿和布吕歇尔领导的第七次反法同盟联军击败。
description.en: Napoleon's final battle, where he was defeated by the armies of the Seventh Coalition under the command of the Duke of Wellington and Gebhard von Blücher.

description.zh-cn: 拿破仑第二次退位后被流放的大西洋岛屿，他在此度过余生。
description.en: The Atlantic island to which Napoleon was exiled after his second abdication, where he spent the rest of his life.

description.zh-cn: 由拿破仑推动编纂的法国民法典，是现代民法典的里程碑，对世界大陆法系的形成影响深远。
description.en: The French civil code established under Napoleon, a landmark in modern civil law that profoundly influenced the development of civil law systems worldwide.

description.zh-cn: 波旁王朝复辟后的法国国王，在拿破仑退位后继任，并在百日王朝后再次复位。
description.en: King of France following the Bourbon Restoration, succeeding Napoleon after his abdication and returning to the throne again after the Hundred Days.

nodes.id: 第一代威灵顿公爵阿瑟·韦尔斯利

zh-cn: 第一代威灵顿公爵阿瑟·韦尔斯利

description.zh-cn: 英国陆军元帅和政治家，在滑铁卢之战中击败拿破仑。
description.en: British field marshal and statesman who defeated Napoleon at the Battle of Waterloo.

nodes.id: 格布哈德·莱贝雷希特·冯·布吕歇尔

zh-cn: 格布哈德·莱贝雷希特·冯·布吕歇尔

description.zh-cn: 普鲁士陆军元帅，在莱比锡战役和滑铁卢战役中扮演了关键角色。
description.en: Prussian field marshal who played a crucial role in the Battle of Leipzig and the Battle of Waterloo.

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯帝国沙皇，在拿破仑战争中是拿破仑的主要对手之一，但在提尔西特条约后曾短暂结盟。
description.en: Emperor of Russia, one of Napoleon's main adversaries during the Napoleonic Wars, although they were briefly allies after the Treaties of Tilsit.

description.zh-cn: 法兰西帝国元帅，拿破仑麾下最勇敢的将领之一，在1812年征俄撤退战役中表现卓越。
description.en: Marshal of the French Empire, one of Napoleon's bravest commanders, renowned for his actions during the retreat from Russia in 1812.

description.zh-cn: 法兰西帝国元帅，以其在奥尔施泰特之战中的杰出指挥而闻名。
description.en: Marshal of the French Empire, famous for his brilliant command at the Battle of Auerstedt.

description.zh-cn: 法兰西帝国元帅，拿破仑的密友，在阿斯珀恩-埃斯灵之战中阵亡。
description.en: Marshal of the French Empire and a close personal friend of Napoleon, who was mortally wounded at the Battle of Aspern-Essling.

description.zh-cn: 拿破仑在第五次反法同盟战争中首次遭遇的重大战术失败，他的好友让·拉纳元帅在此战中阵亡。
description.en: Napoleon's first major tactical defeat during the War of the Fifth Coalition, where his friend Marshal Jean Lannes was mortally wounded.

description.zh-cn: 根据1814年《枫丹白露条约》为拿破仑设立的君主制国家，由拿破仑作为主权亲王统治。
description.en: A monarchy established by the Treaty of Fontainebleau in 1814 for Napoleon to rule as sovereign prince.

description.zh-cn: 拿破仑二世是拿破仑一世的独生婚生子。
description.en: Napoleon II was the only legitimate son of Napoleon I.

description.zh-cn: 拿破仑二世是玛丽·路易莎的儿子。
description.en: Napoleon II was the son of Marie Louise.

description.zh-cn: 拿破仑一世是卡洛·波拿巴的儿子。
description.en: Napoleon I was the son of Carlo Bonaparte.

relationships.target: 玛丽亚·莱蒂西亚·拉莫利诺

description.zh-cn: 拿破仑一世是玛丽亚·莱蒂西亚·拉莫利诺的儿子。
description.en: Napoleon I was the son of Maria Letizia Ramolino.

description.zh-cn: 拿破仑于1796年与约瑟芬结婚，后因其未能生育继承人而于1810年离婚。
description.en: Napoleon married Joséphine in 1796 and divorced her in 1810 due to her inability to produce an heir.

description.zh-cn: 与约瑟芬离婚后，拿破仑出于政治和继承人考虑，于1810年与奥地利公主玛丽·路易莎结婚。
description.en: After divorcing Joséphine, Napoleon married the Austrian princess Marie Louise in 1810 for political reasons and to secure an heir.

description.zh-cn: 法国大革命为拿破仑提供了迅速晋升和施展其军事及政治才能的历史机遇。
description.en: The French Revolution provided Napoleon with the historical opportunity for rapid promotion and the display of his military and political talents.

description.zh-cn: 拿破仑在土伦围城战中表现出色，因此被晋升为准将，为其军事生涯的崛起奠定了基础。
description.en: Napoleon's outstanding performance at the Siege of Toulon led to his promotion to brigadier general, laying the foundation for his military rise.

description.zh-cn: 通过雾月政变，拿破仑成为法兰西第一执政，掌握了法国的最高权力。
description.en: Through the Coup of 18 Brumaire, Napoleon became First Consul of France, seizing supreme power.

description.zh-cn: 雾月政变推翻了督政府的统治。
description.en: The Coup of 18 Brumaire overthrew the rule of the Directory.

description.zh-cn: 拿破仑于1804年建立法兰西第一帝国并加冕为皇帝。
description.en: Napoleon established the First French Empire in 1804 and was crowned Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 拿破仑主持并推动了《法国民法典》（即《拿破仑法典》）的编纂与实施。
description.en: Napoleon presided over and pushed for the codification and implementation of the French Civil Code (the Napoleonic Code).

description.zh-cn: 拿破仑在奥斯特利茨之战中取得决定性胜利，导致第三次反法同盟瓦解。
description.en: Napoleon's decisive victory at the Battle of Austerlitz led to the collapse of the Third Coalition.

description.zh-cn: 1812年入侵俄国的失败是拿破仑帝国由盛转衰的转折点，其“大军团”遭受了毁灭性损失。
description.en: The failure of the 1812 invasion of Russia was the turning point in the decline of Napoleon's empire, causing devastating losses to his Grande Armée.

description.zh-cn: 第六次反法同盟在莱比锡战役中决定性地击败了拿破仑，并最终攻入巴黎，迫使其首次退位并流放至厄尔巴岛。
description.en: The Sixth Coalition decisively defeated Napoleon at the Battle of Leipzig and eventually entered Paris, forcing his first abdication and exile to Elba.

description.zh-cn: 莱比锡之战的失败是拿破仑的重大军事挫折，直接导致其丧失对德意志地区的控制权。
description.en: The defeat at the Battle of Leipzig was a major military setback for Napoleon, directly leading to the loss of his control over the German territories.

description.zh-cn: 拿破仑从厄尔巴岛返回法国，重建帝国，开启了“百日王朝”时期。
description.en: Napoleon returned from Elba to France and restored the Empire, beginning the 'Hundred Days' period.

description.zh-cn: 滑铁卢之战的失败终结了拿破仑的百日王朝。
description.en: The defeat at the Battle of Waterloo ended Napoleon's Hundred Days.

description.zh-cn: 滑铁卢之战的失败导致拿破仑第二次退位并被永久流放至圣赫勒拿岛。
description.en: The defeat at the Battle of Waterloo led to Napoleon's second abdication and his permanent exile to Saint Helena.

description.zh-cn: 拿破仑的崛起和复辟直接导致了波旁王朝的路易十八两次流亡。
description.en: Napoleon's rise and restoration directly led to the two exiles of Louis XVIII of the House of Bourbon.

relationships.target: 第一代威灵顿公爵阿瑟·韦尔斯利

description.zh-cn: 威灵顿公爵是拿破仑在半岛战争和滑铁卢战役中的主要对手。
description.en: The Duke of Wellington was Napoleon's primary adversary in the Peninsular War and at the Battle of Waterloo.

relationships.target: 格布哈德·莱贝雷希特·冯·布吕歇尔

description.zh-cn: 普鲁士元帅布吕歇尔是拿破仑在1813-1815年间最坚定的对手之一。
description.en: Prussian Field Marshal Blücher was one of Napoleon's most determined opponents from 1813 to 1815.

description.zh-cn: 在《提尔西特条约》签订后，拿破仑与沙皇亚历山大一世结为盟友，直到1812年法国入侵俄国。
description.en: After the Treaties of Tilsit, Napoleon and Tsar Alexander I became allies until the French invasion of Russia in 1812.

description.zh-cn: 内伊是拿破仑麾下最著名的元帅之一。
description.en: Ney was one of Napoleon's most famous marshals.

description.zh-cn: 达武是拿破仑麾下最能干的元帅之一。
description.en: Davout was one of Napoleon's most capable marshals.

description.zh-cn: 拉纳元帅是拿破仑的密友之一。
description.en: Marshal Lannes was one of Napoleon's close personal friends.

description.zh-cn: 让·拉纳元帅在阿斯珀恩-埃斯灵之战中受重伤不治身亡。
description.en: Marshal Jean Lannes was mortally wounded at the Battle of Aspern-Essling.

description.zh-cn: 拿破仑在第一次退位后，成为厄尔巴公国的主权统治者。
description.en: After his first abdication, Napoleon became the sovereign ruler of the Principality of Elba.
